landing.title: Eat Healthy, Save Money
landing.subtitle: Create personalized meal plans that fit your budget and dietary needs with our smart planning tools
landing.budgetFriendlyDesc: Create meal plans that fit your budget without compromising on nutrition. Save up to 30% on your grocery bills.
landing.healthyChoicesDesc: Access a wide range of nutritious recipes tailored to your dietary preferences and health goals.
landing.easyPlanningDesc: Generate weekly meal plans and shopping lists with just a few clicks. Save time and reduce food waste.
landing.readyToStart: Ready to Start Your Healthy Journey?
landing.readyToStartDesc: Join thousands of users who are already saving money and eating healthier with our simple planning tools

auth.invalidCredentials: Your email or password is wrong. Please try again.
auth.resetPasswordDesc: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.checkEmail: Check your email for the reset link
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Password reset successfully! You can now sign in with your new password.

calorieTracking.title: Calorie Tracking
calorieTracking.selectDateInstruction: Select a date and click "Get Tracking" to view your calorie data
calorieTracking.addRecipeInstruction: Or add a recipe above to start tracking your calories

calorieTracking.editPortionHelper: Adjust the portion size for this entry

calorieTracking.deleteError: Failed to delete calorie tracking entry. Please try again.
